name: Mill
description: A facility for grinding grain provides essential food processing and creates a hub for agricultural trade. The mechanical power can be adapted for other industries, while the strategic importance makes it a target for control or sabotage.
atmosphere: Massive grinding stones turn with mechanical power while grain dust creates a fine coating on every surface. Water wheels or windmills provide the driving force as farmers bring grain for processing. The air carries fresh flour and mechanical operation. Essential food processing center for the community.
